question: What is the difference between a one-way and round-trip booking on ai2travel.com?

question: What is the multi-sector booking option for?
answer: The multi-sector booking option is for customers who want to book flights to multiple destinations in one trip. For example, if you want to travel from New York to London, then from London to Paris, and finally from Paris back to New York, you can use the multi-sector booking option to book all of these flights at once. The maximum number of sectors you can book for is 5 sectors, which means you can book up to 5 different flights in one trip. This option can save you time and hassle by allowing you to book all of your flights at once instead of having to book each one separately. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via email. We'll be happy to assist you.

question: What is the baggage policy for my flight booked through ai2travel.com?
answer: First of all you need to find your specific flight reservation within your bookings list or on the corresponding airline's website. It should display details such as the airline, flight number, departure date, and destination. Once you identify the airline operating your flight, open a new browser tab or window and visit the official website of that airline. Look for a section on the airline's website specifically dedicated to baggage policy or baggage information. It is typically located under a category like 'Travel Information,' 'Manage Booking,' or 'Before You Fly'. Finally, within the baggage information section, you should find details about baggage allowances, weight limits, size restrictions, and any additional charges or fees for checked baggage or carry-on items. Take note of any specific requirements or restrictions that apply to your booking. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via email. We'll be happy to assist you.

question: What is the cancellation policy for hotels on ai2travel.com?
answer: The cancellation policy for hotels on ai2travel.com varies depending on the supplier's terms and conditions. Generally, cancellation requests made before the due date mentioned in your confirmation, through any of the provided means, will usually receive a 100% refund. In most cases, shortened stays will also be refunded within 10 days.
